channel.description: Recent content in Pages on mnavarro.dev

item.title: Media
item.description: Talks and Workshops Sometimes, nice people take a video when I talk about cool things. That is nice and I’d like to share it with you. Event Sourcing Applied - DevFest, Santiago CL, Oct-2019 Container Theory and Docker - Option SpA, Santiago CL, Dec-2019 PHP Bits Everyone would like to be a famous YouTuber, right? Well, this is my poorly-executed attempt to become one, where I teach about coding and best practices, mostly in PHP.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Mat√≠as, a PHP Jedi Master based in the UK. I’m an skilled Backend Web Developer but I can also do frontend. I also develop in Node JS. I’m currently learning a bit of Go. I have experience in all sort of projects, of different sizes and of wide spectrum of domains: medical, multimedia, air traveling and e-commerce. I love well crafted code and working in complex domains. My style of development revolves around the ideas of Domain Driven Design.
